animeTitle: I Started By Killing Gods in the Temple of Gods
otherNames: 开局我在诸神院斩神, I started by killing gods in the Temple of Gods, Starting Off I Slay Gods in the Academy of Deities, At the Beginning I Slay Gods in the Academy of Deities
synopsis: The world-famous Gods' Hospital is actually a mental hospital. Chen Chang'an, the abandoned son of the Chen family, is the director of this hospital and is also the world's best master. The first female war goddess of the Dragon Kingdom, Shen Bijun, came to break off her engagement. She mocked Chen Changan in her words, but she didn't know that the person in front of her was the one who was about to canonize her. Chen Changan married Bai Susu, the beautiful CEO of the Magic City, due to an engagement, but he was looked down upon by the Bai family, and his mother-in-law even wanted to find another son-in-law. Next, let’s see how Chen Changan slaps those who look down on him in this dispute and tramples all the major families under his feet!
